Package org.acumos.federation.client

Class GatewayClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.acumos.federation.client.ClientBase
      • org.acumos.federation.client.GatewayClient
  • public class GatewayClient
extends ClientBase
    Client for the Federation Gateway's private API. Except as specified, these operations simply request that the gateway server proxy the specified request using the gateway server's own credentials, to the specified peer federation server. Both the gateway server, and the federation server responding to a request proxied by the gateway server, may refuse access to some clients, may refuse access to some operations, may restrict what data is visible to clients, etc. based on their particular policies. This may result in client methods returning null, returning lists with reduced numbers of elements, or throwing RestClientException or its subclasses.
    See Also:
    FederationClient

    • Constructor Detail

      • GatewayClient

        public GatewayClient​(java.lang.String target,
                     ClientConfig conf)
        Create a Gateway Client with the default mapper and resource loader.
        Parameters:
        target - The base URL for the server to be accessed.
        conf - The configuration for certificates and credentials.

      • GatewayClient

        public GatewayClient​(java.lang.String target,
                     ClientConfig conf,
                     com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                     org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader loader)
        Create a Gateway Client.
        Parameters:
        target - The base URL for the server to be accessed.
        conf - The configuration for certificates and credentials.
        mapper - The object mapper. If mapper is null, the default object mapper is used to read and write JSON.
        loader - The resource loader. If loader is null, a DefaultResourceLoader is created and used. The loader is used for accessing the key store and trust store for TLS certificates.

        Returns:

        peerId - The ID of the peer Acumos.
        catalogId - The ID of the catalog to query.
        Returns:

      • getSolution

        public org.acumos.cds.domain.MLPSolution getSolution​(java.lang.String peerId,
                                                     java.lang.String solutionId)
        Ask the remote federation server for information about a solution.
        Parameters:
        peerId - The ID of the peer Acumos.
        solutionId - The ID of the solution.
        Returns:
        The solution's metadata, enhanced with its picture and revisions.

      • triggerPeerSubscription

        public void triggerPeerSubscription​(java.lang.String peerId,
                                    long subscriptionId)
        Ask the local gateway server to poll a subscription. Note that this operation is not proxied by the local gateway server but rather requests the local gateway server to immediately poll the specified subscription to the remote federation server, without waiting until its normally scheduled time.
        Parameters:
        peerId - The ID of the peer Acumos being subscribed.
        subscriptionId - The ID of the local Acumos' subscription to the peer.
